pdftron.PDF

Interface PDFViewCtrl.PageChangeListener

  • Enclosing class:
    PDFViewCtrl

    public static interface PDFViewCtrl.PageChangeListener
    Used for receiving notifications in UI thread when the current page changes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPageChange(int old_page, int cur_page, int state)
      Called in UI thread when the current page changes.

    • Method Detail

      • onPageChange

        void onPageChange(int old_page,
                int cur_page,
                int state)
        Called in UI thread when the current page changes.
        Parameters:
        old_page - the old page number
        cur_page - the current (new) page number
        state - in non-continuous page presentation modes and when the built-in page sliding is in process, this flag is used to indicate the state of page change. Possible values are:
        • PDFViewCtrl.PAGE_CHANGE_BEGIN
        • PDFViewCtrl.PAGE_CHANGE_ONGOING
        • PDFViewCtrl.PAGE_CHANGE_END
        Note:
        If state is PDFViewCtrl.PAGE_CHANGE_BEGIN or PDFViewCtrl.PAGE_CHANGE_END, values of old_page and cur_page are the same, which is the current page number. In continuous page presentation mode, state parameter is always PDFViewCtrl.PAGE_CHANGE_END.
